question: Analyze social media engagement trends for companies in the technology sector over the past year.

subtasks.task: Identify all companies operating in the technology sector and get their key information including active status, name, and industry type.
Gather social media engagement metrics from various platforms (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, YouTube) for the identified technology companies over the past year.
Compile and aggregate engagement metrics (likes, comments, shares) from different social media tables to analyze overall trends in social media activity.
Prepare a summary report on the engagement trends found, highlighting the most engaging platforms and content types for technology companies.
